name: Astral View
description:
Greetings!

Astral View combines several "view limitation" game mechanics into a one superb puzzle game. Have fun!

  • This game was created during DISCORD JAM 1 (#DJAM1) in less than 48 hours.
  • Theme: Limited view.
  • Design, art, music, programming etc.: Toni "thonder_wavemastor" Aaltola
